reviews.productComments: The chair, as others have said isn’t a “sink into” style chair but it IS comfortable once a pillow is added for some support. It does a nice job of adding a pop of color in my living room and complimenting my rug (also from wayfair) I’ll also add that wayfair’s policy on damaged items is amazing. The first chair I received had a small tear on the arm, two days later I got a brand new chair! They didn’t want the damaged chair back.  I decided to keep the other chair and now I have two nice chairs in my living room, one with a tiny tear that most people wouldn’t notice unless I pointed it out.
Honestly surprised at the quality. This is a super cozy chair for curling up with a book. I love how wide it is.

Awesome color. These chairs were super easy to put together and look fantastic. They are a bit firm and the arms need padding, but awesome for a formal living space. I wouldnt want to lounge on them for a whole movie, but exactly what I wanted for an occasional place to sit. Would definitely recommend.

Its super cute, but its really not comfortable. The padding on the seat is a lot thinner than I expected and the arms have virtually no padding. It is very easy to put together and the color in the picture is true to the color of the product. I would put this in an office, or a waiting room somewhere where stylishness of the chair outweighs the need for comfort.
Not only are these chairs comfortable, they are aesthetically pleasing! Adds great color to an otherwise dull room!
good non-everyday use chairs. comfortable
Love this chair it looks great with our new mid century modern look! The beautiful orange color adds a pop of color to our living room. This chair is well-made with good quality fabric.
Love this chair! Easy to assemble. Comfortable. Roomy. Goes great with my decor.
They look great! I love them!!!!

Super cute chair!  The light blue was just as pictured and its pretty comfortable. Seems well made good quality and a breeze to assemble.  I would recommend this chair. Even though the back is low, it was still a comfy chair to curl up in!
Love these chairs! Very comfortable too!
Excellent Chair! The big puppy Loves it. Sturdy. Beautiful color. Easy to assemble. Definitely recommend.
Got here fast, easy to put together, and the blue is a beautiful color!
Love this chair! Very happy with my purchase. Definitely more yellow than green.
Really love the chair. It isn’t the most comfy seat in the house but it’s not uncomfortable by any means. It looks great and was easy to put together. )
Beautiful and comfortable but not a good finishing. There is a stick from inside that will cut the fabric very soon. Something disappointing because a minimum quality control would avoid it.

This chair is gorgeous! It's not fall-asleep reading a book comfortable, but it is have a cocktail and chill comfortable. Very happy that it went on sale for 239- it’s not a 399 chair. It's a perfect 'accent' chair though.
Love this chair!!! I got it in orange. It’s got a lot of red, orange and brown in it. It’s perfect.
This was my first time ordering from Wayfair. I ordered 2 of this armchair and I absolutely love them. They look amazing  with my wooden floor.
Pretty but came with holes all in the fabric. The stuffing is even coming through some of them.
Love these chairs. I got them in Orange! Absolutely great quality.

This is a pretty, modern chair. The seat is firm but comfortable and is a good shape for curling up in. It’s a wide enough chair that you can fit an adult  a small child (good for reading books!). Our only complaint is that there isn’t much for padding along the top of the arm. If you set your arm down fast, it will kind of bang into the frame below the fabric. If you’re looking for a cushioned arm to rest on, look elsewhere. Otherwise, this is a fantastic chair
Nice, aesthetically pleasing chair. It’s firm and not very deep. Not a chair to try to get cozy in. It’s more for looks than function.

I was pretty excited to receive this chair, as it had great reviews.  It did not disappoint. I’ve been using it over my couch ever since it came yesterday.  The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because it came a little beat up and I had to do some repair work to the fabric on the base of the chair. Otherwise great product for the .
Very comfy. Big enough for me and my kids to sit together. It’s perfect to read, play, and relax! I love everything about these chairs❤️

I love this chair and it’s firmness.
The color is even better than I expected and more of a spice than orange.
I haven’t had a bad experience in any purchases I have made though Wayfair and will definitely be making future purchases!
Thank you!
Liz

For the price, these were just what I was looking for. Assembly was a breeze - just screw in the legs. The seat is wide enough for me to bend both of my legs in lotus position comfortably. The cushion is firm-ish with enough give to make it cushy/cozy. The name "Lime Green" is misleading as the actual color is more of a light gold that sways slightly toward the green side. As the photo shows, the fabric is puckering a bit on the chair that get used most frequently. Unfortunately, the photo is a bit distorted which is causing the arms to look lopsided.
Absolutely love this chair!! I have gotten so many compliments! My sofa hasnt arrived yet so excited to see it all together.

I am so happy with this purchase! The orange is, like other reviews stated, darker than the picture but it is a lovely color! It fits great in my sunny study and is the perfect reading chair. Comfy and big! I’ve used it everyday since purchasing. Definitely don’t second guess purchasing this chair. It is a winner!
Love the orange chairs!  The chairs are a darker burnt orange with various colors in the material.  See pictures. Arrived quick and in good shape!
Wide and roomy. Perfect for the area I have. The yellow is more of a greenish yellow but still works in my space. It was easy to screw on the legs.

While I do not have these chairs in their intended spot I was anxious to put one together. Very comfy, deep seat but low enough that a shorty like me can touch the ground. Also enough room to curl up in the seat.
Very well made and sturdy chair! Looks exactly as pictured online. The material seems pretty thick and is actually a really comfortable chair. Just needs an ottoman or footrest!
Obsessed with these chairs! They were the first piece I bought when we bought our new lake house. Very comfortable as well! The prettiest shade of light blue!

Stylish chair.  I got an orange color and love it although it is not completely comfortable.  There is not alot of cushioning on the arm so you can feel the wood piece under, but chair is wide enough as some reviews indicated that you can curl up and read a book.  The chair is now one of cat's favorite.
Great chair. Awesome lines. Super comfy. Lots of room! Perfect for mid century modern or danish modern lovers too.
Absolutely love this chair. Unfortunately, so does my cat!

These chairs are THE best! My kids love them and they are so comfortable. I started with one and then completed my room with the second. Highly recommend to anyone who is looking for easy to assemble, comfortable, and stylish furniture. 1010.
Love this chair! Fast delivery, easy assembly. The seat cushion is very firm but comfortable. A great addition to my living room!
They are quite wide which makes them look much more expensive! Great mid century vibe. I got the lighter blue and they are gorgeous!
Love it! The orange color is darker than pictured but that’s what I was hoping for. It feels more like a rust color and I love it! Very comfortable too!
This chair is so comfortable, and the color is gorgeous - exactly what I had in mind for my home office!
Love it and it’s doggy-approved! Super comfortable and great for studying/working/reading.

Comfortable and beautiful chair. The navy blue is a little bit different than I expected but still fit well with my other furniture. Very easy to assemble and came in perfect conditions. The delivery was quicker than informed and got it in 2 days from purchased.
Beautiful chairs very well made for the price

Great chairs. Tough to get delivered.
This was a bear to get. We ordered two and waiting 2.5 months. Finally the order was cancelled by Wayfair without notifying us. The card hold still shows with my bank and Wayfair wont nix it. We recordered and they came almost immediately! Easy to assemble, comfortable and fit our little reading nook very well.  More issues with the Wayfair process than with the chairs, for sure.

I absolutely love these lounge chairs! The color is so much prettier in person. They both arrived separately, but quickly. Just a couple of days between the two. 
These chairs added some coziness to my home. They are quite comfortable and the quality is great. The only assembly required are the legs which are so easy to screw on it took only 10 mins (and that’s me assembling them slowly).
I’d also like to add that Wayfair’s customer service is brilliant!
Love it!! Firm, but comfy.  Can dangle your legs over the side and cozy up to a good book on it!  Light gray is perfect color. Delivery was easy.  No problems!

Couldn’t even get the tags off before my girls were enjoying the chairs! Well built, study legs with a plate and 3 screws holding each leg. The cushion is firm. Wish maybe the back was a little higher but we still love the chairs. Great value!
Love this chair.  Wish the couch was available in the same beige color that we purchased because I would snag that one too!
I get so many compliments on how comfortable these chairs are!

I took a chance and bought open box. It arrived so fast (2-3 days?) and was in perfect condition. The color is exactly as pictured! It's a sturdy chair. A little wider than I expected, but that's not a bad thing. My 6 yr old and I can comfortably fit in this chair side-by-side together.

Exactly as the other reviewers described. There is a reason this product has a perfect star reviewed it’s awesome! 5’5” 160lb athlete and I fit in it very comfortably, even side leaning with my legs over the armrest. Easy to put together, and sturdy. Came well packaged and easy directions. Unzip the bottom of the chair to get your legs and bolts out when unboxed. Super convenient! The pictures show it a darker blue, but it’s a bit lighter in person. Worked perfectly for what I was going for. The side table and coffee table are also from Wayfair, the “Arlo”. I highly recommend all of these products! The only con I can possibly think of is the fabric does hold onto dog hair. My pup is a light Sandy color, so I can defiantly see when you close. But nothing a little sticky roller won’t fix. -)

Have only had this chair 6 months and it started to rip within 3 months of having it. We use this in a playroom where my 4 year old watches tv so the chair doesn’t get high usage. Most of the time he sits on the floor. I was shocked for $300 that it would rip so easily from a 30 lb child sitting on it. VERY disappointed with this purchase! Definitely rethink this purchase if you will sit in the chair a lot. It’s also very stiff.
This chair is amazing! Great quality at an affordable price, beautiful color and arrived in 2 days. The cushions are firm enough to hold their shape yet still very comfortable.
Really Love this chair, color, modern style easy to assemble. I’m 5’2” 125 and can lounge all over it, curled up, great chair all around. Exactly as it’s advertised!

Exceeded all expectations!  I have watched this chair for 2 years and finally ordered it.  The light blue is a subtle accent color and blends beautifully with the all the gray tones in my room.  The chair sits low which is nice and the wood legs are finished in a beautiful medium stain.  The chair even came sooner than expected!   I am over the moon pleased.

I am always nervous purchasing something like this sight unseen but couldn’t be more pleased with my chairs! The burnt orange color is a vibrant tweed and a perfect accent in my study. They are a bit firm but I expected that. They are very wide and you can easily sit sideways with your legs off the side (I’m 5’10). The lumbar and square pillow (also from Wayfair) make this chair really cozy and perfectly compliment the color. We added some Wayfair ottomans and now it’s one of our favorite places in the house to sit. Highly recommend!

We really like this chair! It is a bit firm but still very comfortable. Delivery took awhile, perhaps 3 weeks total but that was because of some mix up. It would have arrived much sooner if it had not gotten rerouted to another state after only being miles from my home. Assembly was as easy as eating cake. I curl up in this chair with my 7 year old and it is big enough for both of us. We love the pale greyish blue color of the fabric and the seams and overall design seem to be excellent quality. The legs are wooden. We bought this chair along with the Rosalie couch and they compliment each other in style and color. Super duper happy with our Wayfair purchases!
Muy cómodo, excelente material, buen acabado, fácil de ensamblar, el color es igual al de la foto. Lo recomiendo 100
Looks great. But within few months with limited use, the material started to show bobbling.
This chair is such a great add on if you’re looking for a pop of color. Super comfortable and great size. Love it! Highly recommend for the price

These were the best purchase of all. The smart modern look with my velvet blue sofa sets the mood for relaxing either alone or with friends. Being non conventional, I sometime sit with my legs hanging over the arm. Perfect sit either way
These chairs are great! So easy to assemble, and extremely comfortable. Highly recommend!
Love this chair!! Only gave it four stars because it is very stiff. Not really a comfy chair to curl up in. But it is very pretty and the color is great.
Absolutely love this chair. I like that I can curl up or sit crisscross. Great style.

Excellent purchase...im a big guy (6ft 1, 275 lbs) ..was tough trying to find a sturdy yet attractive accent chair. The grey is neutral enough to match multiple colors. Packaging was SERIOUSLY on point to protect the chair (huge plus), and assembly took no time at all (1 person is plenty, as long as you can lift the weight of the chair). Very happy with this chair!!

Absolutely love this purchase and everyone compliments it when they see it. I got the light blue and the color is perfect. (Originally got navy blue but the fabric reminded me of a tuxedo from the 60s. The Wayfair team made it very easy for me to exchange it out. It’s a little firm but it’s still comfortable. Easy to put together. Only need to screw on legs. Highly recommend.
We have had this table for less than a month and it is already starting to chip.
Love it! Great addition to our MCM living room. Highly quality at a great price. This is a “firm” chair which is a great balance to our super soft sofa.
PERFECTION in a chair!  I purchased the light blue for an accent piece in our black and white, modern master bedroom.  It is gorgeous and comfortable.
Great color and size--more of a grass yellow than true yellow. Roomy and firm. Well built.
Love. Love. Love these chairs!! So comfy.
Just what I was looking for to complete the look in my living room. This chair is sturdy without being hard and I love the burnt orange color )
Good quality chair for the price the perfect blue for an accent! Love it

Pictures cannot do the size of this chair justice. It’s a really lovely chair. I bought my first to make sure this is what we wanted and it’s perfect. Ordering a second to complete the look. My only lack for an additional start is a Slight tear underneath where the materials were stored. I really like this chair and I find shopping for decor a struggle so trust me when I say it was worth the buy. Easy to assemble.

Love this chair! Firm and large for spreading out legs over the arms when reading. The color and material are Fabulous. Only had to add legs, they fit perfectly. My chair arrived very quickly. I also ordered the  TV stand you see in the photos, they came 1 day apart, I could not be more pleased with both pieces. Great value for the quality of both pieces.
Love this chair! Nice and wide—perfect for curling up on with a book. Looks much more expensive than it was, which is always a plus!

Love this chair! Color is rich and fabric feels high quality. Took 30 mins to unpack and put the legs on. It’s bigger than I expected which I like but if you have a tiny space you will want to take measurements to make sure it fits and doesn’t take over your space. The arms are not padded on top so it may not be comfy to lean on.

Ugh. I really really wanted to love this chair.  Everyone said it was so comfortable and big. It’s not! Trust me. I don’t write reviews. This would be a good chair to have in your office for people to come and sit. It’s not for watching TV, kind of comfortable. It’s pretty, easy to install and nice to look at. It’s not even high up enough in back to put your head back. I put a sheepskin and pillows and ottoman and still...nope. Not comfy for TV
The perfect fit! The colorsize is true to pictures, very comfortable and roomie. Kitten approved, love it!!!

So much damage! The first chair had a small worn spot in the arm and an odd fabric slub. The replacement chair had the entire bottom torn out. I will fix this by buying black fabric and re-covering the bottom. Plus carrying them upstairs is a two person job. 
These would be awesome chairs if they would just package them more carefully. All this damage happens during shipping. They are just tossed in a box with no padding where they shift and rub, and bang around. 
As for the chairs, they look great, are sturdy, easy to put together, and are comfy. I love the mid century look. They just need to rethink the packing!

Fit the mid century modern theme perfect. Seems to be pretty well made. This room doesn’t get a ton of use so I expect it will wear pretty well. Nice deep blue, easy to put together. This is more of a display setting so I wasn’t overly concerned about comfort but it’s surprisingly good. I’d buy it again.

Really hard to get an accurate picture of the color. It is a much deeper blue than pictured in my pictures or the website but absolutely stunning. Very hefty and well made chair. I like that it is rather large as well. I can sit in it with my feet tucked up to the side and a 20” pillow next to me. VERY cozy reading chair. Love love love.

The quality of the chair is really good . My only concern is that photo shows blue color but it’s actually peacock blue ( more on green side ) just in case some one needs exactly blue this might not be the color for you . They should update the color on the listing so people do not get confused. Other wise it’s really good chair
Love, love, love this chair! I read hundreds of reviews, I knew it would be firm, but it is also super sturdy and comfortable. I am very happy with this purchase!
Perfect size and color! Will look fabulous once our living room is complete!
Beautiful chair.  Super comfortable.  We are ordering another one just like it.
Amazing chair. Shipping time was quick. Assembly was easy. The chair looks as I expected.

Comfortable and stylish. Kid approves. 
One chair came with no hardware. Seller was quick to send a replacement. Overall I love the chairs.
Very nice chair. Love the color and style.

Quick shipping, easy to assemble. Looks great. 
My rear-end approves!
Fabulous chairs. Charcoal does have brown flecks - reads more like a deep brown. But gorgeous. Great for the price!

This chair is easy on the eyes and looks lovely in my room. The bottom cushion is soft. The sides of the arms are soft, but the tops of the arms are indeed hard as others have pointed out. This seat does not have much depth either as others have pointed out. Just grab a tape measure and compare it to your couch for reference. For the price, I compared it to furniture found at a large blue box store then removed a hundred from the price. When it went on sale for my desired price, I grabbed it! All in all, I’m happy with my purchase. It’s a cute little chair and comfortable enough for writing a review on it or hiding away from small children.

Excellent chair!  I just received this chair so I can't comment on its longevity.  However, I can say that this chair is surprisingly high quality for the price.  It feels sturdy and well made. The stitching is well done and the tufting and fabric are even and nicely crafted.  This chair looks expensive.   The legs attached with three bolts for each leg with a convenient (and very sturdy) metal bracket that's pre-attached to each leg and that flat-mounts to the bottom of the chair.  The legs are easy to install and the holes match up perfectly!   As noted in some reviews, the color of my chair (Blue) is somewhat different than some of the pictures. It's gorgeous!   But it's fairly dark and has a very slight aqua or turquoise hue.  The color is not standard navy blue or powder blue/slate blue as it appears in some pics.  In a room with normal or low light, the chair does present as a dark fabric.  I think this chair is outstanding for the price.  [ Being very picky - the only difference I see between this chair and the more expensive couches that it sits next to in my room, is the internal backing on the back and sides of the chair (under the large sections of fabric).  This chair does have nice backing so the fabric is not loose and the fabric doesn't push in if you push on the sides or back of the chair.  However, it flexes a bit and doesn't feel super sturdy like some more expensive furniture does.]

I love my chairs!! They were super easy to put together and are sturdy yet very comfortable. I do wish the top of the arms had a bit more padding but it’s acceptable. The color is exactly what I wanted for my room. I like the width and enjoy reading a book or just relaxing in them. I would recommend these chairs!!

It looks so good!  And the width makes it comfortable to curl up or lounge sideways or squeeze in with a child.  A throw pillow andor ottomanfootstool make it more comfortable for long periods of sitting.
This is my favorite piece of furniture! Great quality, beautiful design, and it's pretty big and comfortable
Looks great in my space but but not comfortable to sit in for an extended period of time.

LOVE, LOVE LOVE!
The chair is so beautiful and such a vibrant color. 
Just bought a 2nd one!
Color is beautiful. Just as I was hoping when description and picture said navy. Sits well. Looks great!
Love my chairs! Everything was as expected from the color and size. Overall very comfortable and the chairs fit exactly what I need in my family room.

Beautiful chair. Came in great packaging that protected it from damage. It’s not the most comfortable - a little too hard for my taste - but a throw pillow makes it much better. Overall, a good purchase.

Highly recommend getting this armchair. It is so comfortable to sit in. Great place to sit and read or curl up with a blanket and watch your favorite showmovie. I get so many compliments from visitors and its usually where they prefer to sit. 1010!

Bought in 96.52cm deep grey color. I have it by my front entrance. Feels wonderful to sit in ) it’s very well made and very tailored. It came well packed and very easy to add the legs on w everything you need.

-( Today is July 31st 2022 — I’m disappointed in how this chair has held up. *Rarely used at my front entrance. The tuffed seat points have the fabric tearing away.  The fabric is actually thin.  There is no warranty after 30 days so I would not recommend this particular style chair.

Love these chairs! I bought two for my primary home and then I bought two more for the beach house. They are extremely comfortable to sit in and very stylish. Very well made. Gives a nice pop of color to a neutral room.
I love these chairs. We bought two for our living room so we had a comfy place to read and everyone loves them. Great items!
We adore this chair, it just makes the space amazing! It’s well put together feels sturdy and very attractive
I love this chair! Such a beautiful accent chair with a hint of class

Love this cute little mid century chair!
Perfect for my space!

Love these chairs! I've had them for about 3 years now and they are still a perfect piece for our living room. 
I love the mid century look, and these are just enough muted yellow to fit perfectly with my decor. 
We usually sit with a leg draped over the edge (I know, I know) but it just goes to show how well built they are, because they are still in fantastic condition and shape. I getany compliments :)
Beautiful! The color is gorgeous!
Very attractive mid century vibe, looks great and has a nice firm feel when sitting on it.

Yes, I get that this photo heavily featured a dog. This chair is great. It is susceptible to dog fur. We tried to scotch guard the chair to keep it looking Perfect but it didn’t work great. We love the look of this chair and the color is true to the website description, but we wish it came with scotch guard options. It does hold up well to vacuuming and lint rolling.
Beautiful chair, roomy and a perfect fit for what I was looking for..
Great, sturdy chair that allows for multiple sitting positions. I wish it were a little less firm, but it’s comfortable! A great reading chair
Fits perfectly in my library! Easy to put together. Not very heavy, easy to move around for placement.
They are perfect for what I wanted. Comfy enough.
So comfortable and stylish with the mid-century look!!  Absolutely love them!! Highly recommend!
Easy to put together and look great in our office! They’re comfortable and adding a couple throw pillows will be a nice touch. Happy with this furniture addition!
Such a fun piece! Love the look of it in our living room!!!

Love this chair! It makes for the perfect reading or relaxing set up! Very quick and easy to put together as the chair is mostly assembled, you just have to attach the legs. I’ve gotten so many compliments on it already and had people asking where I got it from.

It’s already starting to tear at the seams sadly… I love this chair because of how comfortable it is! I can sit in it and read and not have to move around.. hope it holds up for a lot longer even tho it’s starting to let loose on seams.
Beautiful and very clean lined. Large and comfortable. Very classy.
Chairs are as described, easy to assemble

Love love love! I would purchase again! Many compliments on this piece!! It was easy to assemble. It is very comfortable as an accent chair by the fireplace. The blue is perfect for my liking. It almost has a black undertone to the fabric. Quick delivery. Packaged well. Highly recommend.
Love this chair!  Nice  sturdy, firm, and very comfortable.  Beautiful spice color.
Perfect chair for my sitting room. Solid and easy assembly. This is the light blue color.
Stylish but not super comfortable. Wanted a chair I could cuddle up in. This one works for sitting not too long. Perfect size for kids to cuddle up in!

I love this chair SO MUCH! It's a great size, big enough to curl up on completely with a good book. My cats love destroying it and I've had to shave the fibers a few times, but honestly it still looks great. This chair will definitely be standing the test of time.

I took a risk on this chair on the lower price point, and I'm quite pleased! I loooove how it looks, could be a little more comfortable (that's why I only gave 4 stars), but especially if it's more for aesthetics rather than reading for hours on end, it's truly wonderful. For the price, I think it may be among the best options for something of its kind.
I love this accent chairs because they are comfy. They are great for a Family Room of if you like the cozy style.
They look great and are very well made.  They fit in perfectly in my mid century modern home.  They don’t get five stars because they’re really not very comfortable.
Love this chair! We bought two in the light blue. I was about nervous ordering online wand taking a risk with the color, but it is beautiful. The chairs are roomy and comfy.
Nice comfy chair to go with my sofa and other furniture
This chair is great. Hambone approved!
Very pleased with this chair. I only had to put the legs on. IT ARRIVED 2DAYS EARLY. I LOVE THE COLOR.
Love the chairs, I bought the light blue and the color was true to picture. Not super comfortable but they look good!
Really well made chair! It’s comfortable and was super easy to assemble. Was worried how the color would look in person but the light gray is as shown in the pics. So glad I went with this chair!
I found it easy fixing. I adore the chair. Very satisfied once I added the anti skid pads. Perfect
It’s a beautiful chair! I got two of them and they fit perfectly with our space. The blue is a bit darker than the photos online, but I actually like that much better. Comfortable and stylish.
Perfect. Thank you so much. ❤️

I love everything about this chair!  The shape is great, color (light gray) is as pictured, and it’s firm but still comfy.  It came well packaged and all I had to do was attach the legs.  Ordered this as a reading chair for our front room and it’s just perfect

I’m loving my chair in the green color. It’s a neat MCM look that I got for more of an aesthetic to the room while providing a little extra seating if needed. I agree with other comments that it’s likely not going to be a chair you’re going to fall asleep in, comfort-wise, but since I’m not using it as nightly comfort seating that’s not an issue. I do also like how wide it is!
Just what I was looking for! Great quality and very easy to assemble
These chairs are my absolute favorite thing I’ve ever ordered on Wayfair!!!! Everyone compliments them. So comfy.

I got two light blue chairs. They look more blue in the pictures than real life - they definitely have a stronger grey tint when looking at them and less of baby blue. 

I’m happy with the actual color, although I’m not sure how it will go with my sofa. I guess I’ll find out in a couple months once it’s delivered. Legs and hardware came securely packaged in a white pouch stored inside the chair.

These chairs are not sink in feather cushion chairs, but they’re comfy! I totally get what other people said in reviews… They are not airplane chairs by any means. The wide seat and angled arms encourage me sit sideways or curled up most times. Initially I was leaning towards wooden arm mid century chairs, but these are more functional.

FedEx delivered one of the chair packages completely opened and the chair half on the outside (boooo!!). Surprisingly, the chair was untouched!
Love this chair! The perfect touch to the spot under my stairs. Nice and comfy
Well made , comfy! Looks great!
Have received many compliments and chair was easy to assemble. It could be more comfortable but the MCM look works great in my living room.
Just what we needed for our office and it's comfy!
I love this chair. It is very firm and sturdy. I would definatley recommend.
Love my chair!!! Perfect for our beach cottage
Easily one of my favorite chairs. Very comfortable and looks great. We’ve had it for a few years now and it’s held up very well.
Love love love these chairs. So comfortable too!

Chair seems to be a good quality. The color is a little bit different darker than what is shown in the ad￼.  The chair is quite firm.  I don’t imagine I sit in it for hours￼ but no plans to anyway.  A nice complement to my mid century modern furniture.￼  Easy to assemble.
Firm but comfy.  It was initially difficult to get a leg on but we found a staple was in the way.
Spacious, comfortable, and well made!
The color is true to picture. Great for reading while.
Beautiful armchair, I regret not buying 2! Wide, well constructed that adds a nice modern look.

I purchased this accent chair after I purchase the modern couch in the second photo (both from Wayfair). The ottoman too! I like the chair more than the couch but they work well together. I live in a home most would consider a ‘bungalow’ and standard size furniture doesn’t fit well. I sold a large sectional that took up the majority of the ‘room’ and wanted to replace it with streamlined pieces. At the time I was preparing to put the house in the market. The couch in the third photo is the first piece I purchased from Wayfair and I wanted another shade of blue for the opposite side of the space. Most importantly I needed furniture that was affordable, that could be deluded without a huge fee, that I could assemble and move on my own. For that they are perfect.  They room looks terrific and is complemented by visitors.  Neither piece is comfortable for long term sitting (like watching a movie) so that is definitely a trade off.
Love it, it’s firm and wide. So easy to put together.
Just like the picture. Nice for a small place.

Love this chair! I got it in light gray and it is beautiful and comfortable. I like to curl my legs up in my chair and it is perfect for that. Nice and wide. It is very firm. If you are looking for something cushy, you might not like it. It was packaged very well and the legs were easy to put on. Looks great in my spare bedroom.

I love how this chair looks, and it’s super comfortable with an ottoman and throw pillow. I plan to spend a lot of time reading here. 

Only negative is that it’s a little shorter than I imagined it, but that’s not really a problem.
I adore this chair. Super easy to put together and looks amazing with the couch - also from Wayfair. Great quality, love the fabric.

Love this chair.  Color is darker than the online image but it looks great!   Completely fits in with the vibe i was trying to create and it couldn’t have been easier to assemble.   I would buy it again.

We are a family that has all different height people and these chairs deliver! You can cuddle up to read or chill and put your feet up and watch the game. The fabric has held up very well and the mid century styling works so well in our space.
I have been getting so many compliments about this chair. Comfortable and fits perfect in my room. Definitely recommend.

Love love love this chair. This was easy to put together. This chair is comfortable and sturdy. Definitely is holding up to my dog who loves jumping on the chair and crawling underneath the chair. I get a lot of compliments on this beautiful chair.  Definitely thinking about buying another one in a different color.
Cute, easy to put the legs on. Not too deep in the seat, so good for a more narrow space.
Looks beautiful in our space and it’s comfortable.  Love it!
Beautiful chair to complete my hallway corner nook.
Beautiful color, pretty sturdy and easy to put together. I love it!

Absolutely love this accent chair. I am a review follower and really take those into account when purchasing online. The reviews for this chair were right on and 100% agree. Comfortable and gives good back support. Perfect for reading and relaxing. Looks great with my new sectional. Color and style are perfect. Love the look and style.
Beautiful chair. Looks more expensive than it is. I love it and so do my cats.
Beautiful coach. Very comfortable..

Absolutely amazing and great buy from Wayfair. We were little sceptical buying furniture online as we did not want to buy something and get stuck with it. But these chairs are lovely and they are comfortable and very good looking. We got them for very good price during black Friday offer.
I really like this chair. It is sturdy and well made. Came well packaged and was very easy to assemble. Quite comfy to sit in. Great purchase.
I’m totally In love with this chair. I’ve been watching it for a few months and I’m only upset that I didn’t order it sooner. It beautiful, comfortable and stylish. A nice pop of color.
Beautiful and comfortable chairs!
I absolutely love this chair! It was easy to assemble and it looks amazing!
I love this chair! Perfect in my home office!  The light blue looks gray and certain times of the day, depending on the lighting.
Love it! It fits perfectly in my reading corner
Love this chair! Easy to assemble.
All Wayfair here! Chair, ottoman and rugs! Love them all! Just love Wayfair! ❤️
These chairs look great and are fairly comfortable for my needs (reading, company, relaxing while enjoying the view from my window).  Large enough for me to curl my legs up.
I received in a distinct direction and distinct color it’s much darker than the picture in the app I need to change the color to light blue
LOVE this chair!!! We love the color, size and comfort!!!
Bello color tal como lo esperaba
Very nice chair. It’s comfortable and looks nice.

Outstanding quality and the color is much richer than depicted. The chairs bring depth to the living room, and brings a subtle sophistication to any modern styling. I and extremely happy with this purpose. These chairs will last forever
Beautiful, sturdy, and comfortable. I love it!

The chair is comfortable and classy. But how it’s packed for shipping is a very poor design. The heavy legs and hardware are bundled together and zipped into a pocket in the flimsy under fabric of the chair.  It ripped out during shipping.  I just sewed it shut myself but it is damage that could be avoided with more well thought out packaging of the heavy parts.
We loved this chair so much we bought a second one. It’s super easy to put together, pretty comfortable for an accent chair, and love the color options￼￼.
It is solid but comfortable chair. The color is exactly as shown in the picture
Absolutely love the color and style!! Very good quality and I get compliments every time someone comes to our home!

We love this chair! Easy to assemble and looks chic. I’m updating my review because I took this chair from our living room and made myself a reading nook. We are buying the blue version to put in the living room since it matches better. It’s pretty firm so not a cozy chair, but good for what I need! I love how it looks.
Super cute!  Fits in my space perfectly.  Nice and cozy.
The size is great. It’s wide and can fit many positions. I’ve not yet placed it where it’s going but I’m a fan of the color and feel.
